response.headline: Tokyo's First Fireworks of Summer 2025 - 14,000 shells synchronized to J-POP hits at Tokyo Racecourse
response.summary: Tokyo's first summer fireworks show features 14,000 shells synchronized to 100 years of J-POP hits on July 2, 2025 at Tokyo Racecourse, Fuchu. Show runs 19:30-20:40 with shells exploding just 100m away from grandstand seating. Advance purchase required as seats sell out fast.

extracted_text: Tokyo's First Fireworks of Summer — 14,000 Shells & J-POP Hits
Perfectly synced to 100 years of crowd-favorite J-POP hits
Advance purchase required—seats sell out fast
